Articles.Content: Is this format(XX-XX Kerman) new in 0.21 Kerbal Generator?
Sort of. I have a Billy-Boblorf Kerman in 0.20. He was testing some of my flights in my Duna Base Alpha setup days.
This isn't new, I've been getting Billy-Bob(x) Kermans since 0.14 (or whenever persistent saves was implemented). I don't know how they managed to evade you for so long.
